vernac_cmds: Definition is_cons X (l : list X) := match l with | [] => false | _ => true end.
Lemma is_cons_true_iff X (l : list X) : is_cons l = true <-> l <> [].
Fixpoint hash_l (x : string) := match x with | [] => [] | a :: x => # :: a :: hash_l x end.
Fixpoint hash_r (x : string) := match x with | [] => [] | a :: x => a :: # :: hash_r x end.
Definition P := [d;e] ++ map (fun '(x,y) => (#_L x, #_R y)) (filter (fun '(x,y) => is_cons x || is_cons y) (x0/y0::R)).
Lemma P_inv c : c el P -> c = d \/ c = e \/ (exists x y, (x,y) el (x0/y0 :: R) /\ c = (#_L x, #_R y) /\ ( (x,y) <> (nil, nil))).
eapply in_map_iff in H as ((x,y) & <- & (? & ? % orb_prop) % filter_In).
firstorder; destruct x, y; cbn; firstorder congruence.
Lemma P_inv_top x y a : a el Sigma -> ~(a :: x,y) el P.
edestruct fresh_spec with (l := dollar :: Sigma); [ | reflexivity].
edestruct fresh_spec with (l := dollar :: Sigma); [ | reflexivity ].
Lemma tau1_inv (a : nat) B z : tau1 B = a :: z -> exists x y, (a :: x, y) el B.
induction B; cbn; intros; inv H.
Lemma P_inv_bot x y : ~(y, # :: x) el P.
edestruct fresh_spec with (l := dollar :: Sigma); [ | reflexivity ].
Lemma tau2_inv (a : nat) B z : tau2 B = a :: z -> exists x y, (y, a :: x) el B.
induction B; cbn; intros; inv H.
Lemma match_start d' B : d' :: B <<= P -> tau1 (d' :: B) = tau2 (d' :: B) -> d' = d.
assert (d' el P) as [ -> | [ -> | (x & y & ? & -> & ?) ] ] % P_inv by now eapply Hs; cbn -[fresh] in Hm.
destruct x, y; try firstorder congruence.
assert ( (n :: x') / y' el P) as [] % P_inv_top by firstorder.
assert ( y' / (# :: x') el P) as [] % P_inv_bot by firstorder.
induction x; cbn in *; now try rewrite IHx.
Lemma hash_L_app x y : #_L (x ++ y) = #_L x ++ #_L y.
induction x; cbn in *; now try rewrite IHx.
Lemma hash_R_app x y : #_R (x ++ y) = #_R x ++ #_R y.
induction x; cbn in *; now try rewrite IHx.
Lemma hash_L_diff x y : #_L x <> # :: #_R y.
induction x; cbn -[fresh]; intros ? ?; inv H.
Lemma hash_R_inv x y : #_R x = #_R y -> x = y.
revert y; induction x; intros [] H; inv H; firstorder congruence.
Lemma doll_hash_L x: x <<= Sigma -> ~ $ el #_L x.
now eapply fresh_spec in H0 as [].
Lemma MPCP_PCP x y A : A <<= x0/y0 :: R -> x ++ tau1 A = y ++ tau2 A -> exists B, B <<= P /\ (#_L x) ++ tau1 B = # :: #_R y ++ tau2 B.
revert x y; induction A; cbn -[fresh P] in *; intros.
enough ((#_L y ++ [#]) ++ [$] = # :: #_R y ++ [$]) by now autorewrite with list in *.
assert ( (x ++ x') ++ tau1 A = (y ++ y') ++ tau2 A) by now simpl_list.
eapply IHA in H1 as (B & ? & ?) ; [ | firstorder].
Lemma PCP_MPCP x y B : B <<= P -> x <<= Sigma -> y <<= Sigma -> (#_L x) ++ tau1 B = # :: (#_R y) ++ tau2 B -> exists A, A <<= x0/y0::R /\ x ++ tau1 A = y ++ tau2 A.
induction B; cbn -[fresh P] in *; intros.
assert (a el P) as [ -> | [ -> | (x' & y' & ? & -> & ?) ] ] % P_inv by intuition; cbn -[fresh P] in *.
eapply list_prefix_inv in H2 as [[] % hash_L_diff E2].
now eapply fresh_spec in H3 as [].
assert ((#_L x ++ [#]) ++ $ :: tau1 B = (# :: #_R y) ++ $ :: tau2 B) by now simpl_list.
now eapply fresh_spec in H4 as [].
now eapply fresh_spec in H4 as [].
assert ((#_L x ++ #_L x') ++ tau1 B = # :: (#_R y ++ #_R y') ++ tau2 B) by now simpl_list.
intuition; try inv H7; intuition; cbn; now autorewrite with list in *.
Lemma MPCP_PCP_cor : MPCP (x0/y0, R) <-> PCP P.
intros ([|d' B] & Hi & He & H); firstorder.
pose proof H as -> % match_start; eauto.
eapply PCP_MPCP in H1; cbn; eauto.
exists (fun '(x, y, R) => P R x y).
